item.title: invex crop
item.description:
• Flattering Fit: A flattering fit designed to complement a wide range of body types.
  • Superior Comfort: A comfortable elastic waistband stretches up to 4" inches in circumference to provide superior comfort and a perfectly smooth fit around your hips.
  • Adjustable Rise-waistband: Reversed logos on the inside of the waistband. Wear as-is for a medium rise, or rolled down if you prefer a lower rise.
  • Flat-lock Stitching: Contrast Flat-lock stitching creates a flattering, athletic silhouette while providing extra durability.
  • Power Mesh: Mesh panels run along the entire length of the leg to provide extra breathability and stretch.

item.title: vertex zip pocket short
item.description:
• Two-way Drawstring: VELCRO®*-free construction incorporates a patent-pending, two-way drawstring system allowing you to rock out with your drawstring out, or lace up on the inside for a clean competition look.
  • Proprietary Waistband: Waistband stretches up to 4 inches in circumference to provide a perfect fit, without cinching or scrunching; providing clean lines and superior comfort.
  • Fabric of the Future: This ultra-durable, lightweight fabric stretches with your every movement, even deep squats and box jumps for you Crossfitters and functional fitness athletes. Quick drying, moisture wicking fabric performs on land or sea and is impervious to chlorine. Hot tub? Yes.
  • Zipper Side Pockets: Left and right angled zipper pockets are optimally placed at the upper side seams of each leg to suppress the movement of any stowed items while running, falling or awkwardly hanging upside down. Convenient cord access makes either pocket perfect for your phone or MP3 player.
  • Your Perfect Length: Available in regular, above the knee and long. Whether you prefer a specific length or are a taller athlete, there’s a perfect length for you. (Not available in all lengths for every size and color at this time.)

item.title: icon xl convertible backpack
item.g:product_type: Unisex > Bags > Cross-Training Convertible Backpack 2.0 > Black > Stealth Black
item.description:
• Durable: Heavy-duty reinforced stitching and 1680 denier ballistic poly construction ensures long-lasting durability.

  • Convertible: Backpack converts to a large equipment bag, complete with a padded over the shoulder strap.

  • Drawstring Bag/Backpack w/Expandable Compartment: This removable modular drawstring bag is the perfect complement to the convertible equipment backpack. Clips into the rear panel of the main compartment for additional organization or used on its own as a daypack, small gym bag, or additional wet storage compartment.

  • Shoe Locker: In its large equipment bag form, a built-in shoe locker comfortably houses three pairs of shoes. Don’t be surprised by the work out of the day. Have the right shoe for every exercise.

  • Wet/Dry Storage: High intensity workouts equal sweat. Keep the not so dry gear away from your after workout clothes.

  • Laptop/Tablet Sleeve: From the office to the gym, back to the office. A padded laptop/tablet sleeve and accessories compartment can safely secure up to a 17 inch device.

  • Side-pocket Cooler: An insulated side-pocket cooler will keep your post workout meal or shake the perfect temperature.

  • Mesh Pocket: Perfect for folders, books, and notebooks, this oversized mesh pocket provides added organization to the main compartment of the backpack.

  • Sternum Straps: These straps provide additional security and comfort when using the bag as a backpack.

  • Co-branding Panel: The front panel of the backpack is specifically designed for a co-branding opportunity. Perfect for your CrossFit box, gym or any team event.

item.title: NASM apex cargo short
item.description:
• Fabric of the Future: This ultra-durable, lightweight fabric stretches with your every movement, even deep squats and box jumps for you Crossfitters and functional fitness athletes. Quick drying, moisture wicking fabric performs on land or sea and is impervious to chlorine. Hot tub? Yes.
  • Hybrid Waistband: Proprietary waistband stretches up to 4 inches in circumference to provide a perfect fit, without cinching or scrunching; providing clean lines and superior comfort.
  • Secure Side Pockets: Left and Right pockets are optimally placed at the upper side seams of each leg to suppress the movement of any stowed items while running or training.
  • Quick Access Pocket: The right pocket is perfectly constructed for quick access to your iPhone, Droid, or Galaxy smartphone.
  • Durable Drawstring: Long lasting, non-metal welded grommets won’t weigh you down or "pop out", no matter how many times you lace up.
  • Your Perfect Length: Available in regular, above the knee and long. Whether you prefer a specific length or are a taller athlete, there’s a perfect length for you.
  • Built-in Hanger: Rear clamp label incorporates a small loop designed for hanging on a locker hook to dry/air out.

item.title: NASM vertex zip pocket short
item.description:
• Two-way Drawstring: VELCRO®*-free construction incorporates a patent-pending, two-way drawstring system allowing you to rock out with your drawstring out, or lace up on the inside for a clean competition look.
  • Proprietary Waistband: Waistband stretches up to 4 inches in circumference to provide a perfect fit, without cinching or scrunching; providing clean lines and superior comfort.
  • Fabric of the Future: This ultra-durable, lightweight fabric stretches with your every movement, even deep squats and box jumps for you Crossfitters and functional fitness athletes. Quick drying, moisture wicking fabric performs on land or sea and is impervious to chlorine. Hot tub? Yes.
  • Zipper Side Pockets: Left and right angled zipper pockets are optimally placed at the upper side seams of each leg to suppress the movement of any stowed items while running, falling or awkwardly hanging upside down. Convenient cord access makes either pocket perfect for your phone or MP3 player.
  • Your Perfect Length: Available in regular, above the knee and long. Whether you prefer a specific length or are a taller athlete, there’s a perfect length for you. (Not available in all lengths for every size and color at this time.)

item.description:
• Solid Panel: A solid panel replaces the power mesh found on the invex crop.
  • Flattering Fit: A flattering fit designed to complement a wide range of body types.
  • Superior Comfort: A comfortable elastic waistband stretches up to 4" inches in circumference to provide superior comfort and a perfectly smooth fit around your hips.
  • Adjustable Rise-waistband: Reversed logos on the inside of the waistband. Wear as-is for a medium rise, or rolled down if you prefer a lower rise.
  • Flat-lock Stitching: Contrast Flat-lock stitching creates a flattering, athletic silhouette while providing extra durability.

item.title: accent hooded jacket
item.description:

  • Oversized hood: The jackets oversized hood adds a functional fashion forward flare.

  • side pockets: Low profile outer side pockets protect against catching or snagging while still providing easy access for hand warming.

item.title: vertex comp internal pocket short
item.description:
• Internal Drawstring: VELCRO®*-free, the vertex competition short incorporates an internal drawstring system to give you a clean competition look with a secure fit.
  • Competition Colors: Available in four competition color combinations, unique to the vertex comp shorts.
  • Hybrid Waistband: Proprietary waistband stretches up to 4 inches in circumference to provide a perfect fit, without cinching or scrunching; providing clean lines and superior comfort.
  • Fabric of the Future: This ultra-durable, lightweight fabric stretches with your every movement.
  • Internal Pocket: The external zipper pockets were eliminated and replaced with an internal pocket, reducing the chance of snagging or scratching in competition and adding to the professional look of the short.
  • Your Perfect Length: Available in regular, above the knee and long. Whether you prefer a specific length or are a taller athlete, there’s a perfect length for you. (Not available in all lengths for every size and color at this time.)

item.title: O.U.R. tri-blend crew tee
item.description:
• How much does it cost to save a child? Each situation is different depending on travel, research, sting set-up, working with governments, etc., but on average one operation costs about $20,000 and each operation can save anywhere from 1 to 50 children.
  • What happens to rescued children? Operation Underground Railroad rescue missions are always conducted in cooperation with government authorities as such, when children are rescued, they are under the jurisdiction of the county where they are rescued and are placed into state custody. O.U.R. works with the government authorities to place children in orphanages and rehabilitation programs which are predetermined and trusted by O.U.R.
  • What happens to the criminals? Perpetrators are arrested, tried and sentenced. O.U.R. follows this process every step of the way to make sure they can never kidnap and harm children ever again.

item.title: vertex zip pocket short
item.description:
• Two-way Drawstring: VELCRO®*-free construction incorporates a patent-pending, two-way drawstring system allowing you to rock out with your drawstring out, or lace up on the inside for a clean competition look.
  • Proprietary Waistband: Waistband stretches up to 4 inches in circumference to provide a perfect fit, without cinching or scrunching; providing clean lines and superior comfort.
  • Fabric of the Future: This ultra-durable, lightweight fabric stretches with your every movement, even deep squats and box jumps for you Crossfitters and functional fitness athletes. Quick drying, moisture wicking fabric performs on land or sea and is impervious to chlorine. Hot tub? Yes.
  • Zipper Side Pockets: Left and right angled zipper pockets are optimally placed at the upper side seams of each leg to suppress the movement of any stowed items while running, falling or awkwardly hanging upside down. Convenient cord access makes either pocket perfect for your phone or MP3 player.
  • Your Perfect Length: Available in regular, above the knee and long. Whether you prefer a specific length or are a taller athlete, there’s a perfect length for you. (Not available in all lengths for every size and color at this time.)

item.title: helix flex-knit integrated pocket short
item.description:
• Flex-Knit Fabric: This ultra-durable, lightweight fabric stretches with your every movement, even deep squats and box jumps for you Crossfitters and functional fitness athletes. Quick drying, moisture wicking fabric performs on land or sea and is impervious to chlorine.

  • Two-way Drawstring: VELCRO®*-free construction incorporates a patented two-way drawstring system allowing you to lace up on the outside, or keep the drawstring inside for a clean competition look.

  • Patented Waistband: Waistband stretches up to 4 inches in circumference to provide a perfect fit, without cinching or scrunching; providing clean lines and superior comfort.

  • Integrated Zipper Cargo Pockets: The same thoughtful pocket placement as the vertex zip pocket short but with a much larger, integrated pocket . Left and right angled zipper pockets featuring high quality semi-auto lock YKK zippers are optimally placed at the upper side seams of each leg to suppress the movement of any stowed items.

  • Wraparound Panel: Board short inspired wraparound side panels provide a generous cut through the rear and thighs offering mobility where you need it the most.

  • Your Perfect Length: Available in regular, above the knee and long. Whether you prefer a specific length or are a taller athlete, there’s a perfect length for you. (Not available in all lengths for every size and color at this time.)

item.title: 31Heroes tri-blend crew tee
item.description:
• When was 31Heroes Project started? On August 6, 2011, America lost 30 military service members and one military K9– when a CH-47 Chinook helicopter, call sign Extortion 17, was downed in Afghanistan.​ In the wake of the unimaginable tragedy, a mission was born.​
  • What event does 31Heroes hold? 31Heroes first, and most popular event, is the 31Heroes WOD (workout of the day). This WOD is a 31 minute group AMRAP (as many reps as possible) and consists of 8 thrusters, 6 rope climbs, 11 box jumps, with partners rotating the 400m sandbag carries.
  • How many participate in the event 31Heroes is an event that came in the immediate response to help the family of the 30 who were lost. Launched in 2011, the first year of the event raised $300,000 through 430 gyms in just a short few weeks. 4 years later, the 31HEROES WOD has been completed by 35,000 participants in 15 countries and has raised $1.5 million.

item.title: Scratch My Belly tri-blend crew tee
item.description:
• How many animals are put down per year? It is estimated that 8-10 million dogs and cats are put to sleep every year in shelters across the United States because of the irresponsible actions of a few and budget restrictions of shelters. It is time to end unnecessary killing of innocent animals and to stand against animal cruelty by caring for our four legged friends.​
  • How does Scratch My Belly help? Through the first 6 months of 2015, Scratch My Belly has been able to rescue 29 dogs from their unfortunate fate. With the average cost of $250 to improve and save the life of our rescue pets, your donations go to directly to the second chance at a happy life for both the animals rescued and their new forever homes. Scratch My Belly currently applies 100% of donations to provide the vet care for rescue dogs.
  • 2016 goal In 2016, HYLETE hopes to help Scratch My Belly raise $25,000, which would equal a second chance for 100 rescue dogs. These funds would be used to take on medical and rehabilitation cases, allowing animals that otherwise would not have a chance to exit the shelter system, to get a second chance at a happy life.

item.title: BoMF tri-blend crew tee
item.description:
• How many members have received help? Since its inception in 2007, Back on My Feet has grown into 11 chapters across the United States helping more than 5,500 residential members who have run a combined 490,000 miles. Back on My Feet has also helped over 2,000 members obtain employment , over 1,300 members obtain housing, and more than 1,400 members have received training or education.
  • 2016 goal In 2016, HYLETE hopes to help Back on My Feet raise $18,000. It costs, on average, roughly $1,800 to move an individual experiencing homelessness through their life-changing program. This will give 10 people a second opportunity to gain control of their lives..

item.title: 31Heroes Project tri-blend crew tee
item.description:
• When was 31Heroes Project started? On August 6, 2011, America lost 30 military service members and one military K9– when a CH-47 Chinook helicopter, call sign Extortion 17, was downed in Afghanistan.​ In the wake of the unimaginable tragedy, a mission was born.​
  • What event does 31Heroes hold? 31Heroes first, and most popular event, is the 31Heroes WOD (workout of the day). This WOD is a 31 minute group AMRAP (as many reps as possible) and consists of 8 thrusters, 6 rope climbs, 11 box jumps, with partners rotating the 400m sandbag carries.
  • How many participate in the event 31Heroes is an event that came in the immediate response to help the family of the 30 who were lost. Launched in 2011, the first year of the event raised $300,000 through 430 gyms in just a short few weeks. 4 years later, the 31HEROES WOD has been completed by 35,000 participants in 15 countries and has raised $1.5 million.

item.title: O.U.R. reversible headband
item.description:
• How much does it cost to save a child? Each situation is different depending on travel, research, sting set-up, working with governments, etc., but on average one operation costs about $20,000 and each operation can save anywhere from 1 to 50 children.
  • What happens to rescued children? Operation Underground Railroad rescue missions are always conducted in cooperation with government authorities as such, when children are rescued, they are under the jurisdiction of the county where they are rescued and are placed into state custody. O.U.R. works with the government authorities to place children in orphanages and rehabilitation programs which are predetermined and trusted by O.U.R.
  • What happens to the criminals? Perpetrators are arrested, tried and sentenced. O.U.R. follows this process every step of the way to make sure they can never kidnap and harm children ever again.

item.title: nimbus caprite
item.description:
• Adjustable Length: Mesh cuff can be easily tucked away for a capris length, or deployed to provide fuller coverage like a tight. Bottom zippers also allow for any size calf to fit comfortably.

  • Fit and Fabric: A flattering fit built with 4-way stretch fabric provides superior mobility while complementing a wide range of body types. The proprietary fabric is ideal for cooler climates but its breathability will still keep you comfortable on warmer days.

  • Side Pockets: Integrated zippered side pockets store cell phones, credit cards and keys, placed high on the hip to minimize content movement during active use. A mesh outer layer adds an attractive style element while being backed with solid fabric to ensure pocket contents are not visible. YKK semi-auto lock zippers guarantee nothing will fall out of pocket during training.

item.title: helix II flex-knit integrated pocket short
item.description:
• Flex-Knit Fabric: This ultra-durable, lightweight fabric stretches with your every movement, even deep squats and box jumps for you Crossfitters and functional fitness athletes. Quick drying, moisture wicking fabric performs on land or sea and is impervious to chlorine.

  • Two-way Drawstring: VELCRO®*-free construction incorporates a patented two-way drawstring system allowing you to lace up on the outside, or keep the drawstring inside for a clean competition look.

  • Patented Waistband: Waistband stretches up to 4 inches in circumference to provide a perfect fit, without cinching or scrunching; providing clean lines and superior comfort.

  • Integrated Zipper Cargo Pockets: The same thoughtful pocket placement as the vertex zip pocket short but with a much larger, integrated pocket . Left and right angled zipper pockets featuring high quality semi-auto lock YKK zippers are optimally placed at the upper side seams of each leg to suppress the movement of any stowed items.

  • Wraparound Panel: Board short inspired wraparound side panels provide a generous cut through the rear and thighs offering mobility where you need it the most.

  • Your Perfect Length: Available in regular, above the knee and long. Whether you prefer a specific length or are a taller athlete, there’s a perfect length for you. (Not available in all lengths for every size and color at this time.)

item.title: stratum half zip pullover
item.description:
• Half-zip pullover: Built to be easily pulled on and taken off; a half-zip design includes a built-in zipper garage to prevent zipper chaffing.

  • Added Breathability: Strategically placed mesh panels beneath the arms provide the perfect amount of ventilation.

  • Fit and Fabric: A semi-fitted design provides a flattering fit with the ability to accommodate a large range of body types; a drop-tail provides added coverage in the back. Durable lightweight fabric incorporates a semi-slick exterior and a soft interior.

  • Zipper Pockets: Deliberately placed zipper pockets are large enough to keep your hands warm on cooler days and safely stow your valuables as you train.

item.title: verge flex-woven jacket
item.description:
• Flex-woven Fabric: Sweat-wicking, quick drying flex-woven fabric gives the jacket a lightweight feel.

  • Flex-knit Fabric: The lining in the body of the jacket is built with flex-knit fabric, providing extra warmth without hindering your range of motion.

  • Five Pockets: Strategically placed pockets include; one YKK semi-auto lock zipper upper arm pocket that can securely hold a cellphone or music device, eliminating the need for a separate sport armband, two low profile outer pockets for your hands or miscellaneous items, and two YKK semi-auto lock zipper side pockets for additional storage. One of these side pockets includes a media pass through.

  • Fit and Design: A combination of different fabrics as well as aggressive angular lines adds visual depth to the jacket. Designed with an athletic cut that accommodates a large range of body types. Fits true to size.

item.title: verge ll flex-woven zip pocket short
item.description:
• Flex Woven Fabric: Built with lightweight, sweat-wicking, quick drying flex-woven fabric.

  • Flex-Knit Panels: Inset flex-knit fabric panels provide increased stretch and improved range of motion in all the right places

  • Odor Resistant: Anti-microbial treated fabric keeps the shorts germ free.

  • Patented Waistband System:  Waistband stretches up to 4 inches in circumference to provide a perfect fit, without cinching or scrunching; providing clean lines and superior comfort.

  • Two-way Drawstring: VELCRO®*-free construction incorporates a patented two-way drawstring system allowing you to lace up on the outside, or keep the drawstring inside for a clean competition look. New silicone textured drawstrings ensure they stay tied during training.

  • Zipper Side Pockets: Perfectly placed zipper side pockets with semi-auto lock YKK zippers provide the perfect amount of storage with minimal movement of stowed items.

  • Your Perfect Length: Now available in quad-cut, above the knee, regular, and long (not available in all lengths for every size and color).

  • Articulated Knees: Provides a slimming effect without affecting your range of motion.

  • Zipper Side Pockets: Perfectly placed zipper side pockets with semi-auto lock YKK zippers provide the perfect amount of storage with minimal movement of stowed items.

  • Your Perfect Length: Available in multiple inseam lengths. Whether you prefer a specific length or are a taller athlete, there’s a perfect length for you.
